name: C. Bewitching Stargazer
input: InputEach test contains multiple test cases. The first line of input contains a single integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 10^5$$$) — the number of test cases. The description of test cases follows.The only line of each test case contains two integers $$$n$$$ and $$$k$$$ ($$$1 \leq k \leq n \leq 2\cdot 10^9$$$).
output: OutputFor each test case, output a single integer — the final lucky value.
description: C. Bewitching Stargazertime limit per test2 secondsmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard output
